==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=自慰队|type=21}}

===Etymology===
Literally means "[[masturbation]] ([[自慰]]) [[squadron]] ([[隊]])". It is a pun on [[自衛隊]], as the middle characters [[衛]] and [[慰]] are nearly or exactly homophonous in many Sinitic languages.
